segments.text: We have a problem with our roof . Can you come and have a look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have water coming through . It was raining yesterday and this morning we noticed a wet patch on our ceiling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the wet patch just in one place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it seems to be just in the living room , above the window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you look in the attic ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there easy access to the attic ? We'd better look since there may be some flooding there as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have a hatch with a ladder .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we can come early this afternoon . Is anyone going to be at home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my wife will be there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , we have an urgent job this morning but we should finish around lunch time . We will then come straight over to your house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
